module_summaries.summary:
Line 1: Users can log in using their credentials.
Line 2: Displays login form and error messages if login fails.

Line 1: Users can retrieve forgotten login information.
Line 2: Shows customer lookup form and error messages if no match is found.

Line 1: Users can register a new account.
Line 2: Displays registration form and confirmation upon successful registration.

Line 1: Users can open a new bank account.
Line 2: Displays account type selection and funding source options.

Line 1: Users can view an overview of their accounts.
Line 2: Displays account numbers, balances, and available amounts.

Line 1: Users can transfer funds between accounts.
Line 2: Displays transfer form with amount and account selection.

Line 1: Users can make bill payments.
Line 2: Displays bill payment form and confirmation upon successful payment.

Line 1: Users can search for transactions.
Line 2: Displays search results based on transaction criteria.

Line 1: Users can update their profile information.
Line 2: Displays profile form and confirmation upon successful update.

Line 1: Users can apply for a loan.
Line 2: Displays loan application form and confirmation upon approval.

Line 1: Users can securely log out of their account.
Line 2: Displays a return to the login page after logout.

test_cases.title: Successful login with username
test_cases.expected_result: User is taken to their account dashboard

test_cases.title: Successful login with email
test_cases.expected_result: User is taken to their account dashboard

test_cases.title: Login page elements display correctly
steps: Verify the presence of the username or email field
Verify the presence of the password field
Verify the presence of the Log In button
Verify the presence of the Forgot login info? link
Verify the presence of the Register link
test_cases.expected_result: All elements are displayed correctly on the login page

test_cases.title: Successful recovery with valid customer details
test_cases.workflow: Find login information using customer details
steps: Click on Find My Login Info button
test_cases.expected_result: Recovery details displayed

test_cases.title: Successful registration with valid data
steps: Enter the same password in Confirm Password
test_cases.expected_result: Account is created and user is logged in

test_cases.title: Open new Checking account with valid funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Select a valid funding source with sufficient funds
test_cases.expected_result: New Checking account is created, $100.00 is deducted from the funding source, and a unique account number is generated

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the new Checking account appears in the account overview
post_verifications.reason: All test cases operate on the correct module but do not access or confirm the presence of a new Checking account.
post_verifications.suggested_manual_step: Manually check the account overview to ensure the new Checking account is listed.

post_verifications.ideal: Verify $100.00 is deducted from the funding source
post_verifications.execution_note: Use this test to observe the current balance before and after the action. The execution strategy will handle the comparison.
post_verifications.before_action: Record the balance of the funding source account before the action
post_verifications.after_action: Compare the balance and confirm it decreased by $100.00

coverage_gaps: All test cases operate on the correct module but do not access or confirm the presence of a new Checking account.

test_cases.title: Open new Savings account with valid funding source
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Open New Account page
steps: Select a valid funding source with sufficient funds
test_cases.expected_result: New Savings account is created, $100.00 is deducted from the funding source, and a unique account number is generated

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the new Savings account appears in the account overview
post_verifications.reason: None of the test cases confirm the presence of a new Savings account in the account overview.
post_verifications.suggested_manual_step: Manually check the account overview page to ensure the new Savings account is listed.

post_verifications.ideal: Verify $100.00 is deducted from the funding source
post_verifications.execution_note: Use this test to display the current balance of the funding source account before and after the action. The before_after execution strategy will handle the comparison to confirm the $100.00 deduction.
post_verifications.before_action: Record the balance of the funding source account before the action
post_verifications.after_action: Compare the balance and confirm it decreased by $100.00

coverage_gaps: None of the test cases confirm the presence of a new Savings account in the account overview.

test_cases.title: Verify new account appears in account overview
test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully opened a new account
steps: Navigate to the account overview page
test_cases.expected_result: The newly created account is visible in the account overview

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the newly created account is visible in the account overview
post_verifications.reason: None of the test cases confirm the existence of a newly created account in the account overview.
post_verifications.suggested_manual_step: Manually check the account overview page to ensure the newly created account is listed.

coverage_gaps: None of the test cases confirm the existence of a newly created account in the account overview.

test_cases.title: Verify Account Services sidebar displays all options
steps: Check if the sidebar titled 'Account Services' is visible
Verify the presence of 'Open New Account' option
Verify the presence of 'Accounts Overview' option
Verify the presence of 'Transfer Funds' option
Verify the presence of 'Bill Pay' option
Verify the presence of 'Find Transactions' option
Verify the presence of 'Update Contact Info' option
Verify the presence of 'Request Loan' option
Verify the presence of 'Log Out' option
test_cases.expected_result: All specified options are visible in the sidebar

test_cases.title: Verify account number is displayed
steps: Check if the account number is displayed on the page
test_cases.expected_result: Account number is visible

test_cases.title: Verify current balance is displayed
steps: Check if the current balance is displayed on the page
test_cases.expected_result: Current balance is visible

test_cases.title: Verify available amount is displayed
steps: Check if the available amount is displayed on the page
test_cases.expected_result: Available amount is visible

test_cases.title: Verify combined total balance is displayed
steps: Check if the combined total balance is displayed on the page
test_cases.expected_result: Combined total balance is visible

test_cases.title: Successful transfer between accounts
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and on the Transfer Funds page
test_cases.expected_result: Transaction is processed successfully

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the source account balance decreased by the transferred amount
post_verifications.execution_note: Use this test to display the current balance of the source account before and after the transfer.
post_verifications.before_action: Record the balance of the source account before the action
post_verifications.after_action: Compare the balance and confirm it decreased by the transferred amount

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the destination account balance increased by the transferred amount
post_verifications.execution_note: This test can be used to verify the destination account balance by displaying the current balance. It will be executed before and after the transfer to observe any changes.
post_verifications.before_action: Record the balance of the destination account before the action
post_verifications.after_action: Compare the balance and confirm it increased by the transferred amount

test_cases.title: Successful payment with all valid inputs
steps: Re-enter the same valid Account number in Verify Account number
Select a valid From account number from the dropdown
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears upon successful transfer

post_verifications.ideal: Verify a confirmation message appears upon successful payment
post_verifications.execution_note: This test can be used to verify the confirmation message appears upon successful payment.

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the balance of the paying account decreased by the payment amount
post_verifications.execution_note: Use this test to observe the current balance before and after the payment action. The execution strategy will handle the comparison.
post_verifications.before_action: Record the balance of the paying account before the action
post_verifications.after_action: Compare the balance and confirm it decreased by the payment amount

test_cases.title: Successful profile update with all valid inputs
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the Update Profile page
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message is shown upon successful submission

post_verifications.ideal: Verify a confirmation message is shown upon successful profile update
post_verifications.execution_note: This test can be used to verify the confirmation message upon successful profile update.

test_cases.title: Apply for a loan with all fields correctly filled
steps: Select a valid from account number
test_cases.expected_result: Loan is approved

post_verifications.ideal: Verify the loan application is approved
post_verifications.reason: All candidate test cases focus on scenarios where the loan application process is not completed due to errors or missing information. None of them confirm the loan approval status.
post_verifications.suggested_manual_step: After applying for the loan, manually check the loan application status to ensure it shows 'approved'.

coverage_gaps: All candidate test cases focus on scenarios where the loan application process is not completed due to errors or missing information. None of them confirm the loan approval status.

test_cases.title: Successful logout
test_cases.expected_result: User session ends, sensitive data is cleared, and user is returned to the login page

test_cases.title: Verify session ends after logout
steps: Attempt to access a protected page
test_cases.expected_result: Access to the protected page is denied, indicating the session has ended

test_cases.title: Verify sensitive data is cleared after logout
steps: Check for any residual sensitive data in session storage
test_cases.expected_result: No sensitive data is found in session storage

test_cases.title: Verify redirection to login page after logout
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to the login page

All test cases operate on the correct module but do not access or confirm the presence of a new Checking account.

ONA-001.source_test_title: Open new Checking account with valid funding source

execution_order.purpose: Navigate to Account Overview
execution_order.note: Navigate from Open New Account to Account Overview to record baseline data

execution_order.purpose: Record the balance of the funding source account before the action
execution_order.note: Run ACCOVE-003 and RECORD the current values before the action

execution_order.purpose: Navigate to Open New Account
execution_order.note: Return to Open New Account to execute the action

execution_order.test_title: Open new Checking account with valid funding source
execution_order.purpose: Execute the action: Open new Checking account with valid funding source
execution_order.note: Run ONA-001  this is the state-changing action being verified

execution_order.purpose: Navigate to Account Overview
execution_order.note: Navigate from Open New Account to Account Overview to verify the change

execution_order.purpose: Compare the balance and confirm it decreased by $100.00
execution_order.note: Run ACCOVE-003 AGAIN and COMPARE with baseline values recorded in pre-verify

manual_steps.purpose: Verify the new Checking account appears in the account overview
